org.archive.wayback

Interface ReplayRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArchivalUrlASXReplayRenderer, ArchivalUrlCSSReplayRenderer, ArchivalUrlDateRedirectReplayRenderer, ArchivalUrlJSReplayRenderer, ArchivalURLJSStringTransformerReplayRenderer, ArchivalUrlSAXRewriteReplayRenderer, ClientSideHTMLReplayRenderer, DateRedirectReplayRenderer, DomainPrefixTextReplayRenderer, JSPReplayRenderer, ProxyHTMLMarkupReplayRenderer, ReplayRendererDecorator, ServerSideHTMLReplayRenderer, SWFReplayRenderer, TextReplayRenderer, TransparentReplayRenderer

    public interface ReplayRenderer
    ReplayRenderer generates response that replays archived content. It may apply some transformations (often called rewrite) to the content so that:
    • replay page has navigation user interface etc.
    • clicking hyperlinks makes another replay requests rather than jumping to the live web.
    Author:
    brad
    See Also:
    QueryRenderer

      Generate response that replays capture archive httpHeadersResource, reading archived content (HTTP entity) from payloadResource.
      void renderResource(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse, WaybackRequest wbRequest, CaptureSearchResult result, Resource resource, ResultURIConverter uriConverter, CaptureSearchResults results)

    • Method Detail

      • renderResource

        void renderResource(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest,
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse,
                    WaybackRequest wbRequest,
                    CaptureSearchResult result,
                    Resource resource,
                    ResultURIConverter uriConverter,
                    CaptureSearchResults results)
             throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                    IOException,
                    WaybackException
        Generate response that replays capture archive resource.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HttpServletRequest
        httpResponse - the HttpServletResponse
        wbRequest - the WaybackRequest that returned the results
        result - actual CaptureSearchResult that maps to resource to replay
        resource - resource to replay
        uriConverter - the URI converter to use to translate matching results into replayable URLs
        results - all CaptureSearchResults that were returned from the ResourceIndex, probably including other capture dates of the same URL.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - per usual
        IOException - per usual
        WaybackException - if Wayback data specific, anticipated exceptions occur

      • renderResource

        void renderResource(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest,
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse,
                    WaybackRequest wbRequest,
                    CaptureSearchResult result,
                    Resource httpHeadersResource,
                    Resource payloadResource,
                    ResultURIConverter uriConverter,
                    CaptureSearchResults results)
             throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                    IOException,
                    WaybackException
        Generate response that replays capture archive httpHeadersResource, reading archived content (HTTP entity) from payloadResource.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HttpServletRequest
        httpResponse - the HttpServletResponse
        wbRequest - the WaybackRequest that returned the results
        result - CaptureSearchResult that maps to resource to replay
        httpHeadersResource - resource with HTTP headers to replay (typically a revisit record.)
        payloadResource - resource with payload to replay
        uriConverter - the URI converter to use to translate matching results into replayable URLs
        results - all CaptureSearchResults that were returned from the ResourceIndex, probably including other capture dates of the same URL.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - per usual
        IOException - per usual
        WaybackException - if Wayback data specific, anticipated exceptions occur
